\usepackage{quiver}
\begin{document}

% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}
	& {\mathbf{Mod}_{(A,d)}} \\
	{K(\mathbf{Mod}_{(A,d)})} && {(\mathbf{Mod}_{(A,d)}, \text{dws})/\sim }
	\arrow["{Q_1}"', from=1-2, to=2-1]
	\arrow["{Q_2}", from=1-2, to=2-3]
	\arrow["{\alpha }", shift left, dashed, from=2-1, to=2-3]
	\arrow["\beta", shift left, dashed, from=2-3, to=2-1]
\end{tikzcd}
\end{document}
